content.en: Deep Learning for Equations: Researchers are exploring the capabilities of deep learning algorithms in solving complex mathematical problems. They are investigating whether these algorithms can solve high-dimensional partial differential equations, forward and inverse problems involving nonlinear partial differential equations, and fully coupled forward-backward stochastic differential equations. Various algorithms, such as the Deep Galerkin Method, Physics-informed neural networks, and Deep learning methods, are being used to tackle these challenges. The goal is to improve the computational performance and accuracy of solving these equations, which have applications in fields like physics and engineering.
content.da: Deep Learning for ligninger: Forskere udforsker kapaciteterne af deep learning-algoritmer til at løse komplekse matematiske problemer. De undersøger, om disse algoritmer kan løse højdimensionelle partielle differentialligninger, fremadrettede og omvendte problemer, der involverer ikke-lineære partielle differentialligninger, samt fuldt koblede fremad-bagud stokastiske differentialligninger. Forskellige algoritmer, såsom Deep Galerkin-metoden, fysikinformerede neurale netværk og deep learning-metoder, bliver brugt til at tackle disse udfordringer. Målet er at forbedre den beregningsmæssige ydeevne og nøjagtigheden af at løse disse ligninger, som har anvendelser inden for områder som fysik og ingeniørvidenskab.
